SEARCH
Module compiler
Package compiler.common.logger

Class Logger

java.lang.Object
compiler.common.logger.Logger
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class Logger extends Object implements AutoCloseable
A logger generating an XML/XSL log of an individual compiler phase.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Document
    doc
    The entire XML document being constructed.
    private final Stack<Element>
    elements
    The stack of the XML documents (used during construction).
    private final String
    xmlFileName
    The name of the XML file to be produced.
    private final String
    xslFileName
    The name of the relating XSL file (to be included in the XML header).

    • Logger

      public Logger(String phaseName, String xmlFileName, String xslFileName)
      Constructs a new logger.
      Parameters:
      phaseName - The name of the phase being logged.
      xmlFileName - The name of the XML file to be produced.
      xslFileName - The name of the relating XSL file.

  • Method Details

    • close

      public void close()
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable

    • begElement

      public void begElement(String tagName)
      Starts a new XML element (within the active XML element) and makes it active. Only one XML element can be active at each moment.
      Parameters:
      tagName - The tag name of a new XML element.

    • endElement

      public void endElement()
      Ends the current XML element and makes its parent element active. Only one XML element can be active at each moment.

    • addAttribute

      public void addAttribute(String attrName, String attrValue)
      Adds an attribute to the active XML element.
      Parameters:
      attrName - The name of an attribute.
      attrValue - The value of an attribute.
